Eternity, or, The weightiness of the unseen concerns of the other world, from their duration opened, proved, and applyed in a sermon preached in Worcestershire / by Tho. Badland ... Badland, Tho. (Thomas)
[4], 75 p.
Printed for Sampson Evans, book-seller in Worcester, and are to be sold by N. Simmons ..., London : 1676.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
